mapper.select: select a.seq as codeSeq ,a.name as codeName ,a.memo as codeMemo ,a.delNy as codeDelNy ,a.regDatetime as codeRegDatetime ,a.modDatetime as codeModDatetime ,a.codeGroup_seq as codeGroupSeqF from code a where 1=1 and a.delNy = 0 and a.seq = #{codeSeq}
mapper.update: update code set delNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 and seq = #{codeSeq}
